nodes.text: Popo's Sweet Drexl Sausage in Nectarwine
Popo's Sweet Drexl Sausage in Nectarwine was a flavorful sausage invented by Onderonian chef Popotis of Iziz found in his cookbook, Delicacies from the Demon Moon. It was served in nectarwine.
Popo's Sweet Drexl Sausage in Nectarwine is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Onslaught in the codex entry for 'Delicacies from the Demon Moon'.
